trans-unit.source: Enables declarative access to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Permite acessar declarativa [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] dados de associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > In a partial-trust sandbox, XmlDataProvider fails when it does not have permissions to access the given data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]> Em uma área restrita de confiança parcial, XmlDataProvider falha quando não tem permissões para acessar os dados fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about partial trust security, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a segurança de confiança parcial, consulte [segurança de confiança parcial do WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: XmlDataProvider exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.
trans-unit.target: XmlDataProvider expõe as seguintes maneiras de acessar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] dados.

trans-unit.source: - You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the XmlDataProvider class.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode inserir embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] dados usando a classe XmlDataProvider.

trans-unit.source: - You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A> property to the <xref:System.Uri> of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Uri>de um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] arquivo de dados.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: - You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A> property to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode definir a <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>

trans-unit.source: XmlDataProvider performs a full refresh of all bindings when a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: XmlDataProvider executa uma atualização completa de todas as associações quando um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: There are no optimizations for specific nodes.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum otimizações para nós específicos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true` by default, which means that the XmlDataProvider retrieves data and produces the collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes asynchronously by default.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A?displayProperty=fullName>está definida como `true` por padrão, o que significa que o XmlDataProvider recupera dados e produz o conjunto de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nós de forma assíncrona por padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo ou membro oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: The base URI.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the loading of either the inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] or the external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file to produce a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o carregamento do embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] ou externo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] arquivo para produzir uma coleção de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nós.

trans-unit.source: The execution is either immediate or on a background thread, based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A execução for imediata ou em um thread em segundo plano, com base no valor da <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.IsAsynchronous%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> methods of the base class.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A>métodos da classe base.</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.InitialLoad%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> to use as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> para usar como a fonte da associação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>expõe as seguintes maneiras de acessar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] dados.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: - You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode inserir embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] dados usando a <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: - You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A> property to the <xref:System.Uri> of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>propriedade para o <xref:System.Uri>de um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] arquivo de dados.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: - You can set this property to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode definir essa propriedade para um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> performs a full refresh of all bindings on when a <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>executa uma atualização completa de todas as associações em quando um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged?displayProperty=fullName>evento ocorre.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument.NodeChanged?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: There are no optimizations for specific nodes.
trans-unit.target: Não há nenhum otimizações para nós específicos.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A> property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>propriedade é definido, em qualquer linha [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] dados serão descartados.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Document property is set, then the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A> property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de documento é definida, o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>propriedade é limpo e qualquer embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] dados serão descartados.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> object to refresh: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>, Document, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Definir as propriedades a seguir implicitamente fará isso <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>objeto para atualizar: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>, documento, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A> is recommended.
trans-unit.target: Ao alterar as propriedades de fazendo com que a atualização várias, o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>é recomendado.</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"></xref> to use as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlDocument"> </xref> para usar como a fonte da associação.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the initialization of this element has completed; this causes a <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.Refresh*> if no other <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh*> is outstanding.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a inicialização deste elemento foi concluída; Isso faz com que um <> </> *> se nenhum outro <> </> *> estiver pendente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether node collection creation will be performed in a worker thread or in the active context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a criação do conjunto de nó será executada em um thread de trabalho ou no contexto de ativo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform node collection creation in a worker thread; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para executar a criação do conjunto de nós em um thread de trabalho; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source*>propriedade deve ser persistida.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: Isso `ShouldSerialize` método é fornecido, pois o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>propriedade não tem um valor padrão simples.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica se a propriedade foi alterado do valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente você invoca esse método se você estiver desenvolvendo ou um designer para o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>ou desenvolvendo seu próprio controle incorporar <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor da propriedade foi alterado do padrão; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlSerializer*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlSerializer*>propriedade deve ser persistida.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlSerializer*>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica se a propriedade foi alterado do valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica se a propriedade foi alterado do valor padrão.

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Uri> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data file to use as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Uri>do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] arquivo de dados para usar como a fonte da associação.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>expõe as seguintes maneiras de acessar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] dados.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: - You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode inserir embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] dados usando a <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: - You can set this property to the <xref:System.Uri> of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode definir essa propriedade o <xref:System.Uri>de um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] arquivo de dados.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: - You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A> property to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: -Você pode definir a <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Source property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de origem for definido, em qualquer linha [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] dados serão descartados.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A> property is set, then the Source property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>propriedade está definida, em seguida, a fonte de propriedade é limpa e qualquer embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] dados serão descartados.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> object to refresh: Source, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Definir as propriedades a seguir implicitamente fará isso <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>objeto para atualizar: origem, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A> is recommended.
trans-unit.target: Ao alterar as propriedades de fazendo com que a atualização várias, o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>é recomendado.</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file to use as the binding source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] arquivo de dados para usar como a fonte da associação.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: The base URI.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>usada para executar <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath*>consultas.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath*> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *mappingCollection* An .
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores *mappingCollection* .

trans-unit.source: To refer to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMappingCollection>, use the [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para se referir a um <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMappingCollection>, use o [extensões de marcação e WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlNamespaceMappingCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager> used to run <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath*> queries.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>usada para executar <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath*>consultas.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XPath*> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the parser to compile the literal content of the embedded [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data island.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada pelo analisador para compilar o conteúdo literal do embedded [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] ilha de dados.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` --or-- ``` ## XAML Values *elementDataRoot* Required.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do elemento de propriedade de XAML ``` --or-- ``` # # XAML valores *elementDataRoot* necessário.

trans-unit.source: The single root element of the enclosed data island.
trans-unit.target: O elemento raiz único da ilha de dados incluídos.

trans-unit.source: Without a single root, the `x:XData` is invalid as a data source.
trans-unit.target: Sem uma raiz única, o `x:XData` é inválido como uma fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: *elementData* Optional.
trans-unit.target: *elementData* opcional.

trans-unit.source: XML that represents your data.
trans-unit.target: XML que representa os dados.

trans-unit.source: Any number of elements can be contained as element data, nested elements can be contained in other elements, and so on, subject to the general rules of XML.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer número de elementos pode ser contido como dados de elemento, elementos aninhados podem estar contidos em outros elementos e assim por diante, sujeito às regras gerais do XML.

trans-unit.source: The inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Embutido [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""></xref> query used to generate the data collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""> </xref> consulta usada para gerar a coleta de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method handles the `XPath` expressions from the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método trata o `XPath` expressões do <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.XPath%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: `XPath` functions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: `XPath`Não há suporte para funções.

trans-unit.source: For `XPath` expression information, see the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> documentation and some examples provided in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Para `XPath` informações de expressão, consulte o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>documentação e exemplos fornecidos na seção de exemplo.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider> object to refresh: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>, and XPath.
trans-unit.target: Definir as propriedades a seguir implicitamente fará isso <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>objeto para atualizar: <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A>e XPath.</xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.XmlNamespaceManager%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.XmlDataProvider>

trans-unit.source: When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A> is recommended.
trans-unit.target: Ao alterar as propriedades de fazendo com que a atualização várias, o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>é recomendado.</xref:System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider.DeferRefresh%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""></xref> query used to generate the data collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_XPath" name="XPath" href=""> </xref> consulta usada para gerar a coleta de dados.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.
